718009f-a.text:
Canal Street, north side, at Baxter Street.
September 25, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
718009f-a.folder: Canal Street & Baxter Street, Manhattan, NY

716598f-a.text:
95 Baxter Street, east side, south of Walker Street. This is
a 2 1/2-story frame house.
June 9, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
716598f-a.folder: Baxter Street & Walker Street, Manhattan, NY

718008f-a.text:
Canal  Street, north side, east from Baxter to but not including Mulberry Streets.
September 24, 1927.
F.L. Sperr.
718008f-a.folder: Canal Street & Baxter Street, Manhattan, NY

718010f-a.text:
Canal Street, west from Baxter Street. At the left is the junction formed by Walker Street. The Grand Street Ferry street car is shown thereupon. Across the view, in the center runs Centre Street. The horse drawn car on the right is north bound on this thoroughfare. In the vague background is the North (Hudson) River and it's Jersey shore. A view similar to this appears in Valentines Manual of 1863.
About 1860
American Studio, photo
87 Nassau St., N.Y.C.
Gift of Urbrock Collection
718010f-a.folder: Canal Street & Baxter Street, Manhattan, NY
